javelin.controller.map

Class Ziggurat

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.map.Map
      • javelin.controller.map.Ziggurat

  • public class Ziggurat
extends Map
    Clear map divided into 5x5 segments (7 rows/columns). It starts wholly closed an is opened up as the player advances. Some initial areas are also opened by default.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Run
